name: D A V I D L E E
bio: Hello! Thank you for taking the time to look at my portfolio. My name is David Lee and I am currently a Full Stack Software Engineering Immersive student at General Assembly, targeting completion in early February. I graduated from UC San Diego in 2017 with a B.A. in International Business, and spent the next 5 years working in Marketing and Project/Program Management. Outside of my profession, my main hobbies are shooting photography and training Brazilian Jiu-jitsu.
